attributes.title: Uh oh Stinky
attributes.review: This app is honestly a waste of space there is no guarantee that this app doesn’t access our information. Trump surely will hack into us and use our names for submission to vote against our will. Horrible just horrible don’t download

attributes.title: this app 😔
attributes.review: i downloaded this app so that I could stay informed about rallies that I could partake in, but unfortunately when I opened the app a loud screeching noice started playing. Unfortunately my dog heard it and it sent him into cardiac arrest. He didn’t recover. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. rip cheerio❤️🕊fly high

attributes.title: Bad 😤😳
attributes.review: The app is just bad all together, it's slow, it's full of glitches and just doesn't have a purpose. It's really bad even for trump voters and that's saying a lot. Delete this embarrassment. The White house should be crying. This shouldn't be an app.

attributes.title: PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!!! horrible app
attributes.review: the app made my phone catch on fire explode when i tried to enter the app, and i had to buy a new phone. also when i told donald trump his app exploded my phone he stabbed me and called me fat and stole my purse and wallet.  wouldn’t recommend.

attributes.title: Omg 🙄
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to get more info on Trump for the election so I knew where my vote was going. Unfortunately I can’t even seem to be able to open the app without it crashing and freezing. It makes no sense. Smfh 🍟✨

This app is just trash. I downloaded it and it’s boring. The app is just pure garbage. It’s constructed bad. I hate it. I want it to be taken down so other people don’t experience what I went through with this app. Just delete it already. Thank u

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER! i genuinely just downloaded it to keep up with the news and stuff. it crashed SO MUCH and wouldn’t stop glitching. my phone froze for FOUR HOURS when i only spent a few minutes on the app. apple should delete it immediately

attributes.title: Simply no.
attributes.review: I down loaded this app and suddenly Trump appears in my bedroom? Not trying to be part of the Epstein case. I’m simply just a kid wanting to see what our great president has in store for us, but it seems like he wants to put ME in a store. Don’t download.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!!!
attributes.review: The app made my phone crash multiple times and froze up my phone until my phone died! I had to get a new phone because the app burned the software of my phone or something idk i’m not good at technology :(

attributes.title: oh to see without my eyes
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and now I’m a LIBRAL !! do not download this app or else you’ll start doing crazy things like supporting equal rights and treating women with respect!! I wish I could go back to the days when I worshiped our cheeto in command & hated the g*ys 🥺 #freeadam
